name: TMD AFF
author: keyduc

sections.description:
TMD AFF, an amazing plugin for Amazon Affiliate Marketing, makes the process of getting products information from amazon.com much easier in one click by collecting necessary information using ASIN Code.

Major features included in TMD AFF:

  • Getting Product Feature Image without any copyright conflict.
  • Affiliate Link with your business ID tags registered on Amazon
  • Updated Product Price with right time.
  • The most recent Number of customer reviews on Amazon
  • Accurate Product Rating by customers.

Plugin Home Page : http://tmduc.com/wordpress/tmd-aff-plugin-danh-cho-niche-aff-amazon.html
sections.changelog:
• v 1.0 – Final
  • v 1.1 – Fix on genesis child themes
